message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_AUDIT_PLAN_NOT_SET
message.locale: An Audit Plan must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_AUDITOR_AND_AUDIT_TEAM_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A User and an Audit Plan cannot both be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_DUPLICATE_USER_EXISTS
message.locale: The User entered already exists as an Auditor on this Audit Plan.

message.name: ERR_FV_AUDITOR_BADUSER
message.locale: The Auditor must have a Role Name of '%1s' or '%2s'.
